title: Linguistics and education (TEFC)
creator_credit: WRC-TV Productions, Richard Ahearn, Stuart Finley and John Kinnamon
brief_description: Some educators hold views about language which limit their effectiveness in teaching standard English. Having eaten our lunch, the steamboat departed produces a wrong response resulting in a break down in communication. It is in fact a more serious error than are dialectal divergences which produce social reactions but communicate effectively.
